original_text: But Sihon the king of Heshbon would not let us pass by him, for the Lord your God hardened his spirit and made his heart obstinate, that he might give him into your hand, as he is this day.
korean_text: 헤스본 왕 시혼이 우리가 통과하기를 허락하지 아니하였으니 이는 네 하나님 여호와께서 그를 네 손에 넘기시려고 그의 성품을 완강하게 하셨고 그의 마음을 완고하게 하셨음이 오늘날과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: But Sihon the king of Heshbon
would not let us pass by him
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 그의 영토를 지나가는 것을 허락하지 않았으니

sentences.original_text: that he might give him into your hand
